summary: Android reminder app for consórcio sellers with offline-first boleto reminders, WhatsApp shortcuts, dashboard, and simple offline CRM, now also requiring restricted access with user accounts and a paywall/activation flow via Pix payment confirmation by an admin (including an admin panel to manage users and activations).
architectural_notes: Target platform: native Android, compatible with Android 8+
Offline-first: no internet dependency; persistence via local SQLite database
Reminder delivery requires full-screen notification and audible alarm with actionable options (sent/snooze hours/snooze 1 day)
Navigation constraint: at most three main screens; optimized for fast use by external sellers
App language: Portuguese (pt-BR) should be the default UI language
Include a simple offline CRM (lead pipeline/lead list) with reminder/follow-up scheduling integrated into the existing reminder/notification system.
Provide an installable Android APK build artifact (release/signed) for user distribution/testing.
Branding/design must be neutral with no association to Honda (no name, colors, logos, or references).
User confirmed they want the downloadable APK file generated now (proceed with APK build artifact generation/publishing).
Restricted access/paywall flow implies identity + user activation state; app must block all internal screens until account is activated by admin after Pix payment confirmation.
known_issues: Build/deployment process encountered an error during deployment (details not provided).
Painel (Dashboard) não está funcionando corretamente (usuário pediu para que a parte de Painel também funcione).

existing_features.title: Build an offline-first web application named “Lembrete Consórcio Pro” optimized for Android phones (Android 8+ via mobile browser), focused on fast usage and full functionality without internet connection.

Implement a local-only data model for clients with fields: name, phone, boleto due date, installment value, notes, and boleto status (Pending/Sent), persisted on-device (browser storage suitable for offline use).
Provide a direct WhatsApp action for each client phone number that opens a WhatsApp chat using a deep link.
Create the main screen showing a due-date organized list grouped into: Due Today, Due Tomorrow, Next Days, and Overdue, with filters to view Pending only, Sent only (resolved), or All.
Add a simple dashboard panel that shows: count of boletos due today, count of overdue boletos, and total value to receive in the current month (sum of installment values for items due in the month).

Implement due-date reminders that trigger on the scheduled day with an in-app full-screen alert when the app is open, including an audible alarm, and provide actions: Mark as Sent, Snooze for a few hours, Snooze for one day.
Limit navigation to a maximum of three main screens: (1) Home (dashboard + grouped list), (2) Client Add/Edit, (3) Settings/Backup.
Add manual backup/export that works fully offline, allowing users to export stored data to a spreadsheet format and to a PDF document.
Apply a modern, minimalist UI using Honda brand colors: red #E60012, white, and black; use large buttons and layouts optimized for quick use by an external seller.
Capture and display the full deployment/build error output (frontend build + Motoko canister compilation + dfx deploy) in the deployment logs so the failing step and exact error message are visible.
Fix the underlying build/deployment issue so the project compiles and deploys successfully using the standard project deployment flow.
Make Portuguese (pt-BR) the default language for all user-visible UI text in the frontend, including the landing page content and the diagnostics panel UI; also set the document language to pt-BR.
Add an offline-first CRM module to manage leads, persisted locally on the device (browser storage), separate from existing client/boleto items.
Define a lead data model suitable for follow-up tracking, including at minimum: name, phone, notes, lead status, and next follow-up date/time.
Provide a leads list view with fast filtering and sorting for follow-up work (e.g., overdue follow-ups, due today, upcoming, and no follow-up scheduled).
Add lead follow-up reminders that trigger when a lead’s follow-up date/time is reached, showing an in-app full-screen alert when the app is open, with actions to mark as done/reschedule (snooze).
Provide a direct WhatsApp action for each lead phone number that opens a WhatsApp chat using a deep link, consistent with existing WhatsApp behavior for clients.
Integrate the Leads CRM UI into the existing navigation while keeping the app limited to a maximum of three main screens.

Audit the current app end-to-end and fix any broken or incomplete flows so the app is fully functional for offline usage, including: the Home/Dashboard area, the Leads CRM module (create/edit/delete, search/filter/sort, WhatsApp deep link), and in-app follow-up reminders (overlay + snooze/complete) without runtime errors.

Implement an Android-installable offline web app experience (PWA): add a web app manifest, required icons, and an offline-capable service worker so the app can be installed from a mobile browser (Add to Home Screen) and continues to load and function without network connectivity.

Remove or correct any misleading backend connectivity indicators by implementing a real backend health check method (or hiding backend status if the backend is intentionally unused), so the UI reflects the true operational mode of the app.

Remove all explicit mentions of the brand name "Honda" from user-visible UI text, including (but not limited to) the app header subtitle currently showing "Sistema de Lembretes e CRM para Consórcio Honda".
Remove "Honda" from PWA/app metadata so install prompts and browser metadata do not reference Honda (e.g., HTML meta description and web manifest description).

Replace the current Dashboard ("Painel") placeholder content in `frontend/src/App.tsx` with the real Home/Dashboard functionality so the Dashboard works end-to-end offline (dashboard metrics + due-date grouped list + actions).

Ensure Dashboard reminder behavior for client boleto due dates works from the Dashboard flow: due-date reminders must trigger when the app is open, show a full-screen in-app alert with an audible alarm, and provide actions to mark as Sent and snooze (hours / one day).

Restore/ensure navigation from the Dashboard flow to Client Add/Edit so users can create, edit, and delete client boleto entries from the Dashboard area while keeping navigation limited to a maximum of three main screens (Home/Dashboard, Client Add/Edit, Settings/Backup).
Add an Android APK packaging setup that wraps the existing deployed PWA as an installable Android app (Android 8+), producing a debug APK and a signed release APK.

Ensure the PWA is compatible with APK wrapping requirements by providing any required static association files and metadata needed for Android trusted web app / webview packaging (served as static assets from the frontend build output).
Add clear, step-by-step documentation in the repository explaining how to generate the debug APK and the signed release APK, including required prerequisites and commands.

Verify that the wrapped APK preserves the current app’s core behavior: offline-first loading, local data persistence, and WhatsApp deep links, with no new mandatory online dependencies introduced by the APK wrapper.

Generate Android APK build artifacts for download (at minimum a debug APK, and a signed release APK when signing inputs are provided) using the existing Bubblewrap/TWA wrapper setup under `frontend/android/`.

If the Android wrapper configuration still contains placeholders, add explicit validation/error messaging in the APK build flow/documentation to block release builds until required values are set (e.g., the deployed PWA host in `frontend/android/twa-manifest.json` and the SHA-256 fingerprint in `frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.json`).

Generate a downloadable Debug APK using the existing Bubblewrap/TWA wrapper under `frontend/android/` by running the repository’s APK build flow, and publish the resulting `.apk` artifact(s) as build outputs for download.

If valid release signing inputs are present, generate and publish a signed Release APK; otherwise, skip the release build and ensure the build output clearly states why it was skipped and what must be configured to enable it.

Run the existing Android APK build flow and publish the resulting APK artifact(s) for download: always generate the Debug APK, and generate the signed Release APK only when valid signing inputs are present.
Implement a paid-app gate in the frontend so that on first install/open the user can only see a single informational paywall screen until their account is activated by an admin.
Create a paywall screen that displays Pix payment instructions and lets the user submit either a transaction code or an uploaded payment proof to be reviewed by an admin.

Add an admin panel UI in the frontend that is only visible to admin users and supports reviewing new signups, viewing payment submissions, approving payments (activating accounts), and enabling/disabling users.
Update frontend navigation so the app still uses no more than three main screens while supporting the new access gating and admin panel.
Ensure restricted access is enforced defensively: the frontend must gate UI, and the backend must enforce admin-only operations and user status checks where applicable.
Add a configuration location in the frontend to manage Pix payment display values (price amount, Pix key, and instructions), so they can be changed without touching multiple UI components.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create native Android app “Lembrete Consórcio Pro” focused on simplicity, speed, and 100% offline operation (Android 8+)
Client registration: name, phone with direct WhatsApp chat button, boleto due date, installment value, notes, and status (sent/pending)
Automatic reminders on due date with full-screen notification + audible alarm; actions: mark as sent, snooze a few hours, snooze one day
Main screen list grouped by due dates (today, tomorrow, next days, overdue) with filters (pending/resolved/all)
Simple dashboard panel: count due today, count overdue, and total value to receive in the month
Local data storage using SQLite to support fully offline usage; lightweight and fast
Manual backup/export of data to PDF or spreadsheet format
Localize the app UI to Portuguese (pt-BR) as the default language
Add an offline CRM feature: lead management (controle de leads) with reminders/follow-up alerts
Generate a releasable Android APK (signed) for installation/distribution and ensure the app is fully working end-to-end
Remove any Honda branding/mentions and use neutral, non-affiliated visual identity (colors, text, assets)

Run the existing Android APK packaging workflow and publish the resulting APK artifact(s) for the user to download on an Android device: always generate the Debug APK, and generate the signed Release APK only when valid signing inputs are present.

Add restricted access system: user accounts (email+password or admin-provisioned login), paid-app info screen with Pix payment instructions + proof/transaction code submission, manual admin confirmation to activate account, and an admin panel to approve payments and enable/disable users; block all app features until activated

Implement a backend user account system with email+password authentication, an activation (paid) flag, and an enabled/disabled flag so that access can be gated until payment is manually confirmed by an admin.
Add an admin-only backend API to list new registrations, review submitted payment proofs/transaction codes, and approve payment to activate accounts, as well as enable/disable users at any time.
